price: I neka te ne žaloste riječi njihove. Mi, doista, znamo i ono što kriju i ono što pokazuju.
arabic: فَلَا يَحۡزُنكَ قَوۡلُهُمۡۘ إِنَّا نَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: falā yaḥzunka qawluhum innā naʿlamu mā yusirrūna wamā yuʿ'linūna
